main event: Witnesses observed a single unidentified flying object in Brooklyn, New York on September 8, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as round and looked like a star or balloon,The sighting was made at a 45-degree angle from west to east,The object moved in a straight line and exhibited no maneuvers, The sighting lasted for half an hour, Two witnesses included a 15-year-old student and a 45-year-old police officer.
witness description: A 15-year-old student and a 45-year-old police officer, both from Brooklyn, NY, with fair reliability.
